Crane - Chief Executive Officer, President, Executive Director and Member of Nuclear Oversight Committee Mauricio Gutierrez - Chief Operating Officer and Executive Vice President Jason Few - President Kirkland B. Andrews - Chief Financial Officer and Executive Vice President Christopher S. Moser - Chairman, Chief Executive Officer, and President Analysts Ameet I. Thakkar - BofA Merrill Lynch, Research Division Jonathan Cohen - ISI Group Inc., Resea
